title: 4.20 Patch Bugs Megathread
body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter today. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate. 

Also, you may want to check reddit as well: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2mumzc/420_patch_bugs_megathread/

Thank you,
MasterMirkinen

replies.body: I cant accept the patch

Hi folks,

There is a known issue where non-default DPI settings will cause the patcher to display incorrectly and in some cases, prevent you from launching the game client, because the Accept button for the Terms of Use will be off screen. This is something that we're currently working on resolving.

In the meantime, you can work around this issue by resetting your DPI settings back to 100%. You can do so by following the steps below:

1. Go to Control Panel 
2. Go to Appearance and Personalization 
3. Go to Display 
4. Choose the 100% (default) option 
5. Click on Apply 
6. Re-launch League of Legends

Alternatively, you can use the Windows Key and Search "Personalization" (without the quotes) and continue from Step 3 onwards.


We're working on fixing it, but there is no ETA at this stage.

Best Regards,
Mindstar

hi, when find a match on LOL and  go past the champion select screen i get up to the connecting screen where you see the champions everyone is using i load upto around 7% then the game crashes saying

Error
An essential game asset was not found when loading the game:

SRUAP_Turret_Order3_Test

Pleasae try reinstalling the game.....

when i try reconect it justs shows me a message box saying i have no internet or something but i can mesage people using the lol client... PLEASE HELP...
really keen to try this new patch but its disapointing that i cant :((((
Thanks

Hi Emplicator,

Thanks for letting us know about this.  I'm going to check if there are any similar known issues.

In the mean-time, I'd suggest you do a client repair.  You can find the repair instructions [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#jwq6).

-Mindstar
Thank you very much... love ur helpfull comunity

Hi,

Not sure this is a bug or not but is Kalista available in patch 4.20?. Can't buy her at the moment.

Cheers

Regards
Fish and Chips
Activating in coupe of minutes, thanks for the report.
Cheers.
Ashe's Q has no icon when it is turned on. However, the sound, effect and animation is fine. I have only experienced this in an ARAM game. I have not played her again after.

> Ashe's Q has no icon when it is turned on. However, the sound, effect and animation is fine. I have only experienced this in an ARAM game. I have not played her again after.

I wish that it would change the colour of the icon instead. Many times I haven't noticed that it's on/off, and having to fiddle with it while engaging is annoying.

> > Ashe's Q has no icon when it is turned on. However, the sound, effect and animation is fine. I have only experienced this in an ARAM game. I have not played her again after.
> 
> I wish that it would change the colour of the icon instead. Many times I haven't noticed that it's on/off, and having to fiddle with it while engaging is annoying.

A very small QoL buff that I approve of. I kept running oom as Ashe because I forgot to toggle it off a few times. Limited to bad players, but still would be nice. ;p

Azir cannot use any of the jungle items, doesnt get any of the regen or do any of the magic damage and doesnt proc any of the true dmg with the offensive smites. I got to diamond 5 and have been to diamond 2 with elo decay, and I main jungle azir, could you please fix this problem?

cheers,
Celer et Audax
Truly, he can't jungle at all now, its nearly impossible and I have several hundred games with azir jungle.
Azir hasn't even been out that long... That's crazy if you actually have hundreds of games with him just jungling already...
Minion health bars aren't updating the moment they are hit - they go down after 1 or 2 seconds since the damage is dealt. It is also inconsistent, and makes last hitting a real pain.
When playing Graves, the champion icon in the bottom left of the screen still displays him with a cigar in his mouth. Even though it was 'removed'

check this out: The spell smite after you use it it won't reload like other spells it's like a line go through your screen after the cool down it turn to normal ;C riot fix it it looks sick ;C, and i dont know why the line is not show on screen shot.... it dose on my PC and ;C oh god
After a camp (I encountered this with blue buff) has been cleared by the enemy, the icon still shows on the mini map (saying it is still up) when you get vision of the  site of the camp.
Spoils of War's execute gets overridden by Kalista's bonus damage on a minion, meaning Kalista gets the gold by the support doesnt.
Confirmed troll adc.
Actually this is working as intended. Kalista's W damage is credited to Kalista so the kills count as hers, thus not proccing Relic Shield-Face of the Mountain's effect

I find it hard to believe that overriding spoils of war was intended, seems kind of bollocks as I play support Jax a lot and pretty much rely on that execute gold sharing, I'm fine with my ordinary csing going to her, that's massively helpful as I can push waves without fear of stealing gold but I need those executes.
I feel the execute and gold share on the item should override her w damage, otherwise they're nullifying one of the strongest support items for the sake of an ADC's kit.
Definitely troll adc.

I get an 'Unspecified Error' at around 9% when trying to update Client with the option to 'Continue' or 'Send Logs'. Clicking Continue causes the client to resume downloading but it stops consistently at 32% with 0KBps downloading. I have tried 'Repair Client' in from the menu but it doesn't change the sequence of events.

I also can't apparently log in to these boards with my Oceanic summoner for some reason - doesn't recognise the username/password combo.

Hi guys,

There is an old workaround for this issue, give it a shot and see if you have any success:

"Delete your lol_air_client project folder located at: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\
and patch up again.

As a heads up, this will delete your custom item sets if you have any so I would suggest to back them up before deleting the air client folder. Here is how: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21743560-Getting-Started-with-Item-Sets-#backing"

If this does not work, players have had success in the past by connecting through a VPN until the patch is a completed.

Otherwise, there are some other possible solutions available here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

If any of these fixes work then please reply with what worked for you in particular.

If these do not work then I'd recommend creating a support ticket.
Thank you Riot Gehirn, that did seem to work (removing the lol_air_client directory)
any word on the bundle ?
It's up just not in featured, go to bundles tab in store, should be there.

I am having two problems since the patch.

The first, after I have logged on and select "Play" the client disappears. I can see the process is running in Task Manager but I cannot switch to it. So far the only way around it that I have found is to run the lol.launcher.admin file in administrator mode.

The second problem I am having is that every time I open the client it checks files at the top of the screen. It takes about 5 min each time then offers me the Log On screen. Never downloads anything, just checks each time.

Kicked out of champion select and returned to lobby bug. Happens 100% of the time.

If I alt+tab or click on another window as the client is forced to the front to show the champ select, the client freezes (not responding...) for 1-3 seconds and returns me to lobby. During the time the client is frozen, it shows the champ select (can see people in lobby and whatnot) and is slightly paler just like when any other program is frozen and after it responds again, I am back in lobby and I can see all the people I was in lobby with there but in the friends list also in champ select.
When Im playing zyra, the red buff wont go off after death if I kill my killer with flower form.
cant load game cant reconnect. You have given me a leaver penalty cause your servers are broken/...........
Can't log in for some reason. Does the "can't get a response from server" 3 times then comes up with an error

I try to launch my Launcher but I just see the League of Legends banner and then a message pops up saying Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. I have already downloaded patch 4.20
Bug: Warwick can clear the jungle without losing HP and can kill anyone at level 6 with no counterplay.
Bug when playing as Sion, when sion gets red/blue buff after death(in his passive) he retains the visual of the buff for the remainder of the game

Just want to confirm whether the bug where champions with dashes (eg. {{champion:236}} , {{champion:254}} , {{champion:62}}  etc.) have a chance to get there dash spell disabled when being slain mid-dash by hard cc (eg. Snares, Knock-ups) still exists? Have been fearful of playing champs with dashes for nearly a year now due to this bug as I was finding it happen to me in about half of the games I played with champions with these spells.
If this 'bug' was happening a year ago, it is probably not a bug.

I just reported this in a ticket as I am fairly recent and only experienced this the other day, it appears to be rare but ridiculously game breaking when it happens. And sorry trojan horse, but what precisely does a bug turn into with age? Fine wine? An expensive cigar? 'Cos I'm pretty sure a bug is a bug no matter how long it's been out.
I don't think there's anything that can be done about it as Riot pretty much blew me off and it's been around for so long with no recognition.
A suitable workaround that seems to work is put the spell on quickcast, use it once and then return it to normal (vice versa if you play with qc)
It worked for me, although like you I am no longer playing with champs that dash.
